issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw:
I'm under the assumption that the control script that you write for the finals that will be downloaded onto 
Val will have access to the world frames.
So am I correct in thinking that if Dan  runs for example the  keyboard_teleop script on the computer
running the sim with modifications to receive commands from the command computer everything should work ?
content.html: I'm under the assumption that the control script that you write for the finals that will be downloaded onto Val will have access to the world frames. So am I correct in thinking that if Dan runs for example the keyboard_teleop script on the computer running the sim with modifications to receive commands from the command computer everything should work ?
